sources.title: Here Come the Huggetts
sources.description: Title: Here Come the Huggetts Summary: The return of the Huggett family. After first meeting the family at the Holiday Camp, this is on the home front. The Huggetts are about to have their first telephone installed. In today's ... Directed by: Ken Annakin Actors: Jack Warner, Kathleen Harrison, Jane Hylton Production Company: Gainsborough Pictures Release Date: 23 December 1950 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 The return of the Huggett family. After first meeting the family at the Holiday Camp, this is on the home front. The Huggetts are about to have their first telephone installed. In today's high technology age, it is an interesting look at the late 40s, when all this was brand new.

metadata.Plot: The return of the Huggett family. After first meeting the family at the Holiday Camp, this is on the home front. The Huggetts are about to have their first telephone installed. In today's high technology age, it is an interesting look at the late 40s, when all this was brand new.
metadata.Writer: Mabel Constanduros, Denis Constanduros, Peter Rogers
metadata.Actors: Jack Warner, Kathleen Harrison, Jane Hylton
